ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: All users should include an acknowledgement of the source of the SABER data similar to: The SABER data used here are provided through support from the NASA MO&DA program. The Principal Investigator is Dr. James M. Russell III and the Co-PI is Dr. Martin G. Mlynczak.

AccessURL.Name: SABER POC website
AccessURL.Description: This SABER home page provides access to download data files for this product. To request data: click "Data Servides", click "Browse Data", click "Level 2A", click year, month and day of interest, then select the desired file.
